name: Renaissance Park
description: Rennaisance Park is a 5.4 acre park located in Old Fourth Ward off Piedmont Avenue. It is a few blocks north of the Civic center. The park contains a gated off-leash dog park up on the highest section of the park. Patrons of the Peachtree Pine homeless shelter frequent the area.
parking: Street Parking is available alongside the park on Linden Ave and Pine St.
